# PRISMA

```{r, warning=F}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(ggplot2))

amstar = paste0("A", 1:11)
prisma = paste0("P", 1:27)

prisma_human_lmm = read.csv("human_llm_27_IRR.csv")
prisma_human_human = read.csv("../../../data/PRISMA-AMSTAR/cullis2017/paul_kat_27_IRR.csv")

amstar_human_lmm = read.csv("human_llm_11_IRR.csv")
amstar_human_human = read.csv("../../../data/PRISMA-AMSTAR/cullis2017/paul_kat_11_IRR.csv")

ggplot(data.frame(x=prisma_human_human$cohen_kappa_w, y=prisma_human_lmm$cohen_kappa_w, text=prisma_human_human$X), aes(x,y)) + geom_point() + geom_text(aes(label=text), check_overlap = T, hjust="middle", vjust=-0.8) + xlim(-0.1,1) + ylim(-0.1,1) + geom_abline() + theme_bw() + xlab("human-human kappa") + ylab("human-lmm kappa") + ggtitle("PRISMA kappa")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data.frame(x=prisma_human_human$agreement, y=prisma_human_lmm$agreement, text=prisma_human_human$X), aes(x,y)) + geom_point() + geom_text(aes(label=text), check_overlap = T, hjust="middle", vjust=-0.8) + xlim(-0.1,1) + ylim(-0.1,1) + geom_abline() + theme_bw() + xlab("human-human agreement") + ylab("human-lmm agreement") + ggtitle("PRISMA agreement")
```
